title: Essar Energy Transition to build Europe's first hydrogen-fuelled power plant
description: Essar Energy Transition will construct Europe's first all hydrogen-fueled power plant at Stanlow refinery by 2027. The $3.6 billion EET Hydrogen Power project entails 125 MW capacity and 6,000 tonnes of steam. It supports EET Fuels' aim for a 95% cut in emissions by 2030, enhancing employment in North West UK.
